data.name: uHdcpA0
description: A control to set the second LSB of the HDCP port I2C address.

values.description: I2C address for HDCP port is 0x74. Used for Single-Link Mode or 1st Receiver in Dual-Link Mode
I2C address for HDCP port is 0x76. Used only for a 2nd receiver Dual-link Mode.

data.name: uHdcpOnlyMode
description: A control to configure a HDCP only mode for simultaneous analog and HDMI modes. Refer to the
ADC_HDMI_SIMULTANEOUS_MODE bit. By selecting HDCP only mode HDMI activity is reduced and it can be used as
a power saving feature in simultaneous analog and HDMI operation.

values.description: Normal Operation
HDCP Only Mode

data.name: uBgMeasPortSel
description: BG_MEAS_PORT_SEL[1:0] selects a background port on which HDMI measurements are to be made and provided in
the background measurement registers. The port in question must be set as a background port in order for
this setting to be effective. There is no conflict if this matches the port selected by HDMI_PORT_SELECT.

values.description: Port A
Port B

data.name: uHdmiPortSelect
description: This two bit control is used for HDMI primary port selection.

values.description: Port A
Port B

data.name: uReserved7_5
description: No description.

data.name: uMuxDsdOut
description: An override control for the DSD output

values.description: Override by outputting I2S data
Override by outputting DSD/DST data

data.name: uOvrAutoMuxDsdOut
description: DSD/DST override control. In automatic control DSD or I2S interface is selected according to the type of
packet received. DSD/DST interface enabled if part receives DSD or
DST audio sample packet. I2S interface is enabled when part receives audio sample packets or when no
packet is received. In manual mode MUX_DSD_OUT selects the output interface.

values.description: Automatic DSD/DST output control
Override DSD/DST output control

data.name: uOvrMuxHbr
description: A control to select automatic or manual configuration for HBR outputs. Automatically, HBR outputs are
encoded as SPDIF streams. In manual mode MUX_HBR_OUT selects the audio output interface.

values.description: Automatic HBR output control
Manual HBR output control

data.name: uMuxHbrOut
description: A control to manually select the audio output interface for HBR data. Valid when OVR_MUX_HBR is set to 1.

values.description: Override by outputting I2S data
Override by outputting SPDIF data

data.name: uTermAuto
description: This bit allows the user to select automatic or manual control of clock termination. If automatic mode
termination is enabled, then the termination on the port selected via HDMI_PORT_SELECT[1:0] is enabled.
The termination is disabled on all other ports.

values.description: Disable Termination automatic control
Enable Termination automatic control

data.name: uReserved7_2
description: No description.

data.name: uEnBgPortB
description: Background mode enable for Port B. Sets the Port B in background mode to establish a HDCP link with its
source even if the port is not selected by HDMI_PORT_SELECT. This control has no effect if the port is
selected by HDMI_PORT_SELECT.

values.description: Port disabled, unless selected with HDMI_PORT_SELECT
Port enabled in background mode.

data.name: uEnBgPortA
description: Background mode enable for Port A. Sets Port A in background mode to establish a HDCP link with its source
even if the port is not selected by HDMI_PORT_SELECT. This control has no effect if the port is selected
by HDMI_PORT_SELECT.

values.description: Port disabled, unless selected with HDMI_PORT_SELECT
Port enabled in background mode.

data.name: uReserved7
description: No description.

data.name: uI2soutmode
description: A control to configure the I2S output interface.

values.description: I2S Mode
Right Justified
Left Justified
Raw SPDIF (IEC60958) Mode

data.name: uI2sbitwidth
description: A control to adjust the bit width for right justified mode on the I2S interface.

values.description: 0 bit
1 bit
2 bits
24 bits
30 bits
31 bits

data.name: uReserved7
description: No description.

data.name: uAvMute
description: Readback of AVMUTE status received in the last General Control packet received.

values.description: AVMUTE not set
AVMUTE set

data.name: uHdcpKeysRead
description: A readback to indicate a successful read of the HDCP keys and/or KSV from the internal HDCP Key OTP ROM. A
logic high is returned when the read is successful.

values.description: HDCP keys and/or KSV not yet read
HDCP keys and/or KSV HDCP keys read

data.name: uHdcpKeyError
description: A readback to indicate if a checksum error occurred while reading the HDCP and/or KSV from the HDCP Key
ROM Returns 1 when HDCP Key master encounters an error while reading the HDCP Key OTP ROM

values.description: No error occurred while reading HDCP keys
HDCP keys read error

data.name: uHdcpRiExpired
description: Readback high when a calculated Ri has not been read by the source TX, on the active port. It remains high
until next Aksv update

data.name: uReserved2
description: No description.

data.name: uTmdsPllLocked
description: A readback to indicate if the TMDS PLL is locked to the TMDS clock input to the selected HDMI port.

values.description: The TMDS PLL is not locked
The TMDS PLL is locked to the TMDS clock input to the selected HDMI port.

data.name: uAudioPllLocked
description: A readback to indicate the Audio DPLL lock status.

values.description: The audio DPLL is not locked
The audio DPLL is locked

data.name: uHdmiMode
description: A readback to indicate whether the stream processed by the HDMI core is a DVI or an HDMI stream.

values.description: DVI Mode Detected
HDMI Mode Detected

data.name: uHdmiContentEncrypted
description: A readback to indicate the use of HDCP encryption.

values.description: The input stream processed by the HDMI core is not HDCP encrypted
The input stream processed by the HDMI core is HDCP encrypted

data.name: uDviHsyncPolarity
description: A readback to indicate the polarity of the HSync encoded in the input stream

values.description: The HSync is active low
The HSync is active high

data.name: uDviVsyncPolarity
description: A readback to indicate the polarity of the VSync encoded in the input stream

values.description: The VSync is active low
The VSync is active high

data.name: uHdmiPixelRepetition
description: A readback to provide the current HDMI pixel repetition value decoded from the AVI Infoframe received. The
HDMI receiver automatically discards repeated pixel data and divides the pixel clock frequency
appropriately as per the pixel repetition value.

values.description: 1x
2x
3x
4x
5x
6x
7x
8x
9x

data.name: uVertFilterLocked
description: Vertical filter lock status. Indicates whether or not the vertical filter is locked and vertical
synchronization parameter measurements are valid for readback.

values.description: Vertical filter has not locked
Vertical filter has locked

data.name: uAudioChannelMode
description: Flags stereo or multichannel audio packets. Note stereo packets may carry compressed multi-channel audio.

values.description: Stereo Audio (may be compressed multichannel)
Multichannel uncompressed audio detected (3-8 channels).

data.name: uDeRegenFilterLocked
description: DE regeneration filter lock status. Indicates that the DE regeneration section has locked to the received
DE and horizontal synchronization parameter measurements are valid for readback.

values.description: DE regeneration not locked
DE regeneration locked to incoming DE

data.name: uLineWidth
description: Line width is a horizontal synchronization measurement. The gives the number of active pixels in a line.
This measurement is only valid when the DE regeneration filter is locked.
xxxxxxxxxxxxx - Total number of active pixels per line.

values.description: Total number of active pixels per line.

data.name: uLineWidth
description: Line width is a horizontal synchronization measurement. The gives the number of active pixels in a line.
This measurement is only valid when the DE regeneration filter is locked.
xxxxxxxxxxxxx - Total number of active pixels per line.

values.description: Total number of active pixels per line.

data.name: uReserved7_5
description: No description.

data.name: uField0Height
description: Field 0 Height is a vertical filter measurement. This readback gives the number of active lines in field
xxxxxxxxxxxxx - The number of active lines in Field 0

values.value: 0.  This measurement is valid only when the vertical filter has locked.
values.description: undefined
The number of active lines in Field 0

data.name: uField0Height
description: Field 0 Height is a vertical filter measurement. This readback gives the number of active lines in field
xxxxxxxxxxxxx - The number of active lines in Field 0

values.value: 0.  This measurement is valid only when the vertical filter has locked.
values.description: undefined
The number of active lines in Field 0

data.name: uDeepColorMode
description: A readback of the deep color mode information  extracted from the general control packet

values.description: 8-bits per channel
10-bits  per channel
12-bits per channel
16-bits per channel (not supported)

data.name: uHdmiInterlaced
description: HDMI input Interlace status, a vertical filter measurement.

values.description: Progressive Input
Interlaced Input

data.name: uField1Height
description: Field 1 height is a vertical filter measurement. This readback gives the number of active lines in field.
This measurement is valid only when the vertical filter has locked. Field 1 measurements are only valid
when HDMI_INTERLACED is set to 1.
xxxxxxxxxxxxx - The number of active lines in Field 1

values.description: The number of active lines in Field 1

data.name: uField1Height
description: Field 1 height is a vertical filter measurement. This readback gives the number of active lines in field.
This measurement is valid only when the vertical filter has locked. Field 1 measurements are only valid
when HDMI_INTERLACED is set to 1.
xxxxxxxxxxxxx - The number of active lines in Field 1

values.description: The number of active lines in Field 1

data.name: uReserved7_4
description: No description.

data.name: uFreqtolerance
description: Sets the tolerance in MHz for new TMDS frequency detection. This tolerance is used for the audio mute mask
MT_MSK_VCLK_CHNG and the HDMI status bit NEW_TMDS_FRQ_RAW.
xxxx - Tolerance in MHz for new TMDS frequency detection

values.description: Default tolerance in MHz for new TMDS frequency detection

data.name: uManAudioDlBypass
description: Audio Delay Bypass Manual Enable.  The audio delay line  is automatically active for stereo samples and
bypassed for multichannel samples. By setting MAN_AUDIO_DL_BYPASS to 1 the Audio delay bypass
configuration can be set by the user with the AUDIO_DELAY_LINE_BYPASS control.
automatically enabled if stereo audio is received.
AUDIO_DELAY_LINE_BYPASS control.

values.description: Audio delay line is automatically bypassed if multichannel audio is received. The audio delay line is
Overrides automatic bypass of audio delay line. Audio delay line is applied depending on the

data.name: uAudioDelayLineBypass
description: Manual bypass control for the audio delay line. Only valid if MAN_AUDIO_DL_BYPASS is set to 1.

values.description: Enables the audio delay line.
Bypasses the audio delay line.

data.name: uReserved5
description: No description.

data.name: uAudioMuteSpeed
description: Number of samples between each volume change of 1.5dB when muting and unmuting

data.name: uReserved7_6
description: No description.

data.name: uCtsChangeThreshold
description: Sets the tolerance for change in the CTS value. This tolerance is used for the audio mute mask
MT_MSK_NEW_CTS and the HDMI status bit CTS_PASS_THRSH_RAW and the HDMI interrupt status bit
CTS_PASS_THRSH_ST. This register controls the amounts of LSBs that the CTS can change before an audio
mute, status change or interrupt is triggered.
xxxxxx - Tolerance of CTS value for CTS_PASS_THRSH_RAW and MT_MSK_NEW_CTS

values.description: Tolerance of CTS value for CTS_PASS_THRSH_RAW and MT_MSK_NEW_CTS

data.name: uReserved7
description: No description.

data.name: uAudioFifoAlmostFullThreshold
description: Sets the threshold used for FIFO_NEAR_OVRFL_RAW. FIFO_NEAR_OVRFL_ST interrupt is triggered if audio FIFO
reaches this level

values.description: Default value

data.name: uReserved7
description: No description.

data.name: uAudioFifoAlmostEmptyThreshold
description: Sets the threshold used for FIFO_NEAR_UFLO_RAW. FIFO_NEAR_UFLO_ST interrupt is triggered if audio FIFO
goes below this level

values.description: Default value

data.name: uReserved7
description: No description.

data.name: uAcMskVclkChng
description: Audio Coast Mask for TMDS clock change. When set the audio DPLL coasts if the TMDS clock has any
irregular/missing pulses.

values.description: Audio DPLL coasts if TMDS clock any irregular/missing pulses.
Audio DPLL does not coast if TMDS clock any irregular/missing pulses.

data.name: uAcMskVpllUnlock
description: Audio Coast Mask for TMDS PLL Unlock. When set the audio DPLL coasts if the TMDS PLL unlocks.

values.description: Audio DPLL coasts if TMDS DPLL unlocks.
Audio DPLL does not coast if TMDS DPLL unlocks.

data.name: uReserved4
description: No description.

data.name: uAcMskNewCts
description: Audio Coast Mask for a new ACR CTS value. When set the audio DPLL coasts if CTS changes by more than
threshold defined in CTS_CHANG_THRESHOLD[5:0].
CTS_CHANGE_THRESHOLD[5:0].

values.description: Audio DPLL coasts if CTS changes by more than the threshold set in register CTS_CHANGE_THRESHOLD[5:0].
Audio DPLL does not coast if CTS changes by more than the threshold set in register

data.name: uAcMskNewN
description: Audio Coast Mask for a new ACR N value. When set the audio DPLL coasts if N value changes.

values.description: Audio DPLL coasts if a change in the N value occurs.
Audio DPLL does not coast if a change in the N value occurs.

data.name: uAcMskChngPort
description: Audio Coast Mask for a HDMI port change. When set the audio DPLL coasts if a change in the active port
occurs.

values.description: Audio DPLL coasts if the active port is changed.
Audio DPLL does not coast if the active port is changed

data.name: uAcMskVclkDet
description: Audio Coast Mask for a TMDS clock detection. It sets the audio PLL to coast if no TMDS clock is detected
on the active port.

values.description: Audio DPLL coasts if a TMDS clock is not detected on the active port.
Audio DPLL does not coast if a TMDS clock is not detected on the active port.

data.name: uReserved7_6
description: No description.

data.name: uMtMskComprsAud
description: Audio Mute Mask for compressed audio. It sets the audio mutes if the audio received is in a compressed
format.

values.description: Audio mute occurs if audio is received in compressed format.

data.name: uMtMskAudModeChng
description: Audio Mute Mask for audio mode change. It sets audio mutes if audio changes between any of the following
PCM, DSD, HBR or DST formats.

values.description: Audio mute occurs if audio changes between any of the following PCM, DSD, HBR or DST formats.

data.name: uReserved3_2
description: No description.

data.name: uMtMskParityErr
description: Audio Mute Mask for a parity error. It sets the audio mutes if an audio sample packet is received with an
incorrect parity bit.

values.description: Audio mute occurs if an audio sample packet is received with an incorrect parity bit.

data.name: uMtMskVclkChng
description: Audio Mute Mask for TMDS Clock Change. It sets the audio mutes if the TMDS clock has irregular/missing
pulses.

values.description: Audio mute occurs if the TMDS clock has irregular/missing pulses.

data.name: uMtMskApllUnlock
description: Audio Mute Mask for Audio PLL Unlock. It sets the audio mutes if the Audio PLL unlocks.

values.description: Audio mute occurs if  the Audio PLL unlocks.

data.name: uMtMskVpllUnlock
description: Audio Mute Mask for TMDS PLL Unlock. When set audio mutes if the TMDS PLL unlocks.

values.description: Audio mute occurs if the TMDS PLL unlocks.

data.name: uMtMskAcrNotDet
description: Audio Mute Mask for ACR packet. When set the audio mutes if an ACR packet has not been received within one
VSync.

values.description: Audio mute occurs if an ACR packet has not been received within one VSync.

data.name: uReserved4
description: No description.

data.name: uMtMskFlatlineDet
description: Audio Mute Mask for Flatline bit. When set the audio mutes if an audio packet is received with the
flatline bit set.

values.description: Audio mute occurs if an audio packet is received with the flatline bit set.

data.name: uReserved2
description: No description.

data.name: uMtMskFifoUnderlfow
description: Audio Mute Mask - FIFO Underflow

data.name: uMtMskFifoOverflow
description: Audio Mute Mask - FIFO Overflow

data.name: uMtMskAvmute
description: Audio Mute Mask for AVMUTE. When set the audio mutes if a general Control packet is received with the
SET_AVMUTE bit set.

values.description: Audio mute occurs if AVMUTE is set by a general control packet

data.name: uMtMskNotHdmimode
description: Audio Mute Mask for a non HDMI input stream. When set the audio mutes if the HDMI_MODE bit goes low.

values.description: Audio mute occurs if HDMI mode bit goes low

data.name: uMtMskNewCts
description: Audio Mute Mask for a change of ACR CTS. When set the audio mutes if the CTS changes by more than the
specified threshold. CTS_CHANGE_THRESHOLD register sets this threshold.

values.description: Audio mute occurs if CTS changes

data.name: uMtMskNewN
description: Audio Mute Mask for a New ACR N. If set the audio mutes if there is a change in the N value.

values.description: Audio mute occurs if N changes

data.name: uMtMskChmodeChng
description: Audio Mute Mask for a audio channel mode change. When set the audio mutes if the channel mode changes
between stereo and multichannel.

values.description: Audio mute occurs if channel mode changes

data.name: uMtMskApcktEccErr
description: Audio Mute Mask for Audio Packet ECC Error. When set the audio mutes if an uncorrectable error is detected
in audio packet by the ECC block.

values.description: Audio mute occurs if an uncorrectable error is detected in the audio packet by the ECC block

data.name: uMtMskChngPort
description: Audio Mute Mask for HDMI Port Change. When set the audio mutes if HDMI port selection is changed.

values.description: Audio mute occurs if HDMI port selection is changed

data.name: uMtMskVclkDet
description: Audio Mute Mask for TMDS Clock. When set the audio mutes if a TMDS clock is not detected.

values.description: Audio mute occurs if TMDS is not detected

data.name: uReserved7_4
description: No description.

data.name: uHbrAudioPcktDet
description: HBR Packet detection bit. This bit resets to zero on the 11th HSync leading edge following an HBR packet
if a subsequent HBR packet has not been detected. It also resets if an Audio, DSD or DST packet sample
packet has been received and after an HDMI reset condition.

values.description: No HBR audio packet received within the last 10 HSync.
HBR audio packet received within the last 10 HSync.

data.name: uDstAudioPcktDet
description: DST Audio Packet Detection bit. This bit resets to zero on the 11th HSync leading edge following an DST
packet if a subsequent DST has not been received. Or if an Audio, DSD or HBR packet sample packet has been
received or after an HDMI reset condition.

values.description: No DST packet received within the last 10 HSync.
DST packet received within the last 10 HSync.

data.name: uDsdPacketDet
description: DSD Audio Packet Detection bit. This bit resets to zero on the 11th HSync leading edge following a DSD
packet or if an Audio, DST or HBR packet sample packet has been received or after an HDMI reset condition.

values.description: No DSD packet received within the last 10 HSync.
DSD packet received within the last 10 HSync.

data.name: uAudioSamplePcktDet
description: Audio Sample Packet Detection bit.  This bit resets to zero on the 11th HSync leading edge following an
Audio packet if a subsequent audio sample packet has not been received or if a DSD, DST or HBR Audio
packet sample packet has been received.

values.description: No L_PCM or IEC 61937 compressed audio sample packet received within the last 10 HSync.
L_PCM or IEC 61937 compressed audio sample packet received within the last 10 HSyncs.

data.name: uReserved7_3
description: No description.

data.name: uDstDouble
description: A flag to indicate when DST audio is double data rate.

values.description: No DST double data rate audio detected
DST double data rate audio detected

data.name: uReserved1_0
description: No description.

data.name: uReserved7
description: No description.

data.name: uIgnoreParityErr
description: A control to select the processing of audio samples even when they have a parity error.

values.description: Discard audio sample packet that have an invalid parity bit.
Process audio sample packets that have an invalid parity bit.

data.name: uReserved5
description: No description.

data.name: uMuteAudio
description: A control to force an internal mute independently of the mute mask conditions

values.description: Audio in normal operation
Force audio mute

data.name: uWaitUnmute
description: A control to delay audio unmute. Once all mute conditions are inactive WAIT_UNMUTE[2:0] can specify a
further delay time before unmuting. NOT_AUTO_UNMUTE must be set to 0 for this control to be effective.

values.description: Disables/cancels delayed unmute. Audio unmutes directly after all mute conditions become inactive
Unmutes 250 ms after all mute conditions become inactive
Unmutes 500 ms after all mute conditions become inactive
Unmutes 750 ms after all mute conditions become inactive
Unmutes 1 s after all

data.name: uNotAutoUnmute
description: A control to disable the auto unmute feature. When set to 1 audio can be unmuted manually if all mute
conditions are inactive by setting NOT_AUTO_UNMUTE to 0 and  then back to 1.

values.description: Audio unmutes following a delay set by WAIT_UNMUTE after all mute conditions have become inactive.
Prevents audio from unmuting automatically

data.name: uReserved7_5
description: No description.

data.name: uDcfifoResetOnLock
description: Enables the reset/re-centering of video FIFO on video PLL unlock

values.description: Do not reset on video PLL lock
Reset FIFO on video PLL lock

data.name: uDcfifoKillNotLocked
description: DCFIFO_KILL_NOT_LOCKED controls whether or not the output of the Video FIFO is set to zero when the video
PLL is unlocked.

values.description: FIFO data is output regardless of video PLL lock status
FIFO output is zeroed if video PLL is unlocked

data.name: uDcfifoKillDis
description: The Video FIFO output is zeroed if there is more than one resynchronization of the pointers within 2 FIFO
cycles. This behavior can be disabled with this bit.

values.description: FIFO output set to zero if more than one resynchronization is necessary during two FIFO cycles
FIFO output never set to zero regardless of how many resynchronizations occur

data.name: uReserved1_0
description: No description.

data.name: uReserved7_4
description: No description.

data.name: uDcfifoLocked
description: A readback to indicates if Video FIFO is locked.

values.description: Video FIFO is not locked. Video FIFO had to resynchronize between previous two Vsyncs
Video FIFO is locked. Video FIFO did not have to resynchronize between previous two Vsyncs

data.name: uDcfifoLevel
description: A readback that indicates the distance between the read and write pointers. Overflow/underflow would read
as level 0. Ideal centered functionality would read as 0b100.

values.description: FIFO has underflowed or overflowed
FIFO is about to overflow
FIFO has some margin.
FIFO has some margin.
FIFO perfectly balanced
FIFO has some margin.
FIFO has some margin.
FIFO is about to underflow

data.name: uReserved7_6
description: No description.

data.name: uUpConversionMode
description: A control to select linear or interpolated 4:2:2 to 4:4:4 conversion. A 4:2:2 incoming stream is
upconverted to a 4:4:4 stream before being sent to the CP.

values.description: Cr and Cb samples are repeated in their respective channel.
Interpolate Cr and Cb values.

data.name: uReserved4_0
description: No description.

data.name: uReserved7_6
description: No description.

data.name: uTotalLineWidth
description: Total line width is a horizontal synchronization measurement. This gives the total number of pixels per
line. This measurement is valid only when the DE regeneration filter has locked.
xxxxxxxxxxxxxx - Total number of pixels per line.

data.name: uTotalLineWidth
description: Total line width is a horizontal synchronization measurement. This gives the total number of pixels per
line. This measurement is valid only when the DE regeneration filter has locked.
xxxxxxxxxxxxxx - Total number of pixels per line.

data.name: uReserved7_5
description: No description.

data.name: uHsyncFrontPorch
description: HSync front porch width is a horizontal synchronization measurement. The unit of this measurement is
unique pixels. This measurement is valid only when the DE regeneration  filter has locked.
xxxxxxxxxxxxx - Total number of pixels in the front porch.

data.name: uHsyncFrontPorch
description: HSync front porch width is a horizontal synchronization measurement. The unit of this measurement is
unique pixels. This measurement is valid only when the DE regeneration  filter has locked.
xxxxxxxxxxxxx - Total number of pixels in the front porch.

data.name: uReserved7_5
description: No description.

data.name: uHsyncPulseWidth
description: HSync pulse width is a horizontal synchronization measurement. The unit of this measurement is unique
pixels. This measurement is valid only when the DE regeneration filter has locked.
xxxxxxxxxxxxx - Total number of pixels in the hsync pulse.

data.name: uHsyncPulseWidth
description: HSync pulse width is a horizontal synchronization measurement. The unit of this measurement is unique
pixels. This measurement is valid only when the DE regeneration filter has locked.
xxxxxxxxxxxxx - Total number of pixels in the hsync pulse.

data.name: uReserved7_5
description: No description.

data.name: uHsyncBackPorch
description: HSync Back Porch width is a horizontal synchronization measurement. The unit of this measurement is unique
pixels. This measurement is valid only when the DE regeneration filter has locked.
xxxxxxxxxxxxx - Total number of pixels in the back porch.

data.name: uHsyncBackPorch
description: HSync Back Porch width is a horizontal synchronization measurement. The unit of this measurement is unique
pixels. This measurement is valid only when the DE regeneration filter has locked.
xxxxxxxxxxxxx - Total number of pixels in the back porch.

data.name: uReserved7_6
description: No description.

data.name: uField0TotalHeight
description: Field 0 total height is a vertical synchronization measurement. This readback gives the total number of
half lines in Field 0. This measurement is valid only when the vertical filter has locked.
xxxxxxxxxxxxxx - The total number of half lines in Field 0. (Divide readback by 2 to get number of lines)

values.description: The total number of half lines in Field 0. (Divide readback by 2 to get number of lines)

data.name: uField0TotalHeight
description: Field 0 total height is a vertical synchronization measurement. This readback gives the total number of
half lines in Field 0. This measurement is valid only when the vertical filter has locked.
xxxxxxxxxxxxxx - The total number of half lines in Field 0. (Divide readback by 2 to get number of lines)

values.description: The total number of half lines in Field 0. (Divide readback by 2 to get number of lines)

data.name: uReserved7_6
description: No description.

data.name: uField1TotalHeight
description: Field 1 total  height is a vertical synchronization measurement. This readback gives the total number of
half lines in Field 1. This measurement is valid only when the vertical filter has locked. Field 1
measurements are valid when HDMI_INTERLACED is set to 1.
xxxxxxxxxxxxxx - The total number of half lines in Field 1. (Divide readback by 2 to get number of lines)

values.description: The total number of half lines in Field 1. (Divide readback by 2 to get number of lines)

data.name: uField1TotalHeight
description: Field 1 total  height is a vertical synchronization measurement. This readback gives the total number of
half lines in Field 1. This measurement is valid only when the vertical filter has locked. Field 1
measurements are valid when HDMI_INTERLACED is set to 1.
xxxxxxxxxxxxxx - The total number of half lines in Field 1. (Divide readback by 2 to get number of lines)

values.description: The total number of half lines in Field 1. (Divide readback by 2 to get number of lines)

data.name: uReserved7_6
description: No description.

data.name: uField0VsFrontPorch
description: Field 0 VSync front porch width is a vertical synchronization measurement. The unit of this measurement is
half lines. This measurement is valid only when the vertical filter has locked.
to get number of lines)
xxxxxxxxxxxxxx - The total number of half lines in the VSync Front Porch of Field 0. (Divide readback by 2
to get number of lines)

values.description: The total number of half lines in the VSync Front Porch of Field 0. (Divide readback by 2

data.name: uField0VsFrontPorch

data.name: uDeepColorModeUser

description: This control allows the user to override the pixel repetition factor. The ADV7844 then uses
DEREP_N instead of HDMI_PIXEL_REPETITION[3:0] to discard video pixel data from the incoming HDMI stream.
information.

values.description: Automatic detection and processing of procession of pixel repeated modes using the AVI infoframe

description: A control to select manual control of the RGB colorimetry when the AVI infoframe field Q[1:0]=00. To be
used in conjunction with QZERO_RGB_FULL

values.description: AVI InfoFrame ITC bit decides RGB-full or limited range in case Q[1:0]=00
Manual RGB range as per QZERO_RGB_FULL.

data.name: uQzeroRgbFull
description: A control to manually select the HDMI colorimetry when AVI infoframe field Q[1:0]=00. Valid only when
QZERO_ITC_DIS is set to 1.

values.description: RGB-limited range  when Q[1:0]=00
RGB-full when Q[1:0]=00

data.name: uAlwaysStoreInf
description: A control to force InfoFrames with checksum errors to be stored.

values.description: Stores data from received InfoFrames only if their checksum is correct
Always store the data from received InfoFrame regardless of their checksum

and unconnected.
Normal mode).

data.name: uGamutIrqNextField
description: A control set the NEW_GAMUT_MDATA_RAW interrupt to detect when the new contents are applicable to next

packet.

Interrupt flag  indicates that Gamut packet is to be applied next field

data.name: uReserved3_2
description: No description.

data.name: uCsCopyrightManual
description: A control to select automatic or manual setting of the copyright value of the channel status bit that is
passed to the SPDIF output. Manual control is set with the CS_COPYRIGHT_VALUE bit.

values.description: Automatic CS copyright control
Manual CS copyright control. Manual value is set by CS_COPYRIGHT_VALUE

data.name: uCsCopyrightValue
description: A control to set the CS Copyright value when in manual configuration of the CS Copyright bit that is
passed to the SPDIF output.

values.description: Copyright value of channel status bit is 0. Valid only if CS_COPYRIGHT_MANUAL is set to 1
Copyright value of channel status bit is 1. Valid only if CS_COPYRIGHT_MANUAL is set to 1

description: This register provides a full precision integer TMDS frequency measurement

description: This register provides a full precision integer TMDS frequency measurement

description: A readback to indicate the fractional bits of measured frequency of PLL recovered TMDS clock. The unit is
xxxxxxx - Outputs 7-bit TMDS fractional frequency measurement in 1/128MHz

values.description: undefined
Outputs 7-bit TMDS fractional frequency measurement in 1/128MHz

data.name: uReserved7_4
description: No description.

data.name: uHdmiColorspace
description: A readback of the HDMI input colorspace decoded from several fields in the AVI infoframe.

values.description: RGB_LIMITED
RGB_FULL
YUV_601
YUV_709
XVYCC_601
XVYCC_709
YUV_601_FULL
YUV_709_FULL
sYCC 601
Adobe YCC 601
Adobe RGB

data.name: uFilt5vDetDis
description: This bit is a control to disable the digital glitch filter on the HDMI 5V detect signals. The filtered
signals are used as interrupt flags, and also used to reset the HDMI section. The filter works from an
internal ring oscillator clock and is therefore available in power-down mode. The clock frequency of the
ring oscillator is 42MHz +/-10%.
Note: If the 5 V pins are not used and left unconnected, the 5 V detect circuitry should be disconnected
from the HDMI reset signal by setting DIS_CABLE_DET_RST to 1. This avoids holding the HDMI section in
reset.

values.description: Enabled
Disabled

data.name: uFilt5vDetTimer
description: This bit is a control to set the timer for the digital glitch filter on the HDMI +5 V detect inputs. The
unit of this parameter is 2 clock cycles of the ring oscillator (~ 47ns). The input must be constantly
high for the duration of the timer, otherwise the filter output remains low. The output of the filter
returns low as soon as any change in the +5 V power signal is detected.
xxxxxxx - Time duration of +5 V deglitch filter. The unit of this parameter is 2 clock cycles of the ring
oscillator (~47ns)

values.description: Approximately 4.2us

data.name: uReserved7_6
description: No description.

data.name: uBgMeasReq
description: This bit must be set to get correct measurements of the selected background port. Setting this control
sends a request to update the synchronization parameter measurements of the currently selected background
port. The port on which the measurement will be made is selected by BG_MEAS_PORT_SEL[1:0].

values.description: No request to update selected background port synchronization parameter measurements
Requests an update of the selected background port synchronization parameter measurements

data.name: uReserved4
description: No description.

data.name: uHdcpReptEdidReset
description: A reset control for the E-EDID/Repeater controller. When asserted it resets the E-EDID/Repeater controller.

values.description: Normal operation
Resets the E-EDID/Repeater controller.

data.name: uDcfifoRecenter
description: A reset to recenter the Video FIFO. This is a self clearing bit.

values.description: Video FIFO normal operation.
Video FIFO to re-centre.

data.name: uReserved1
description: No description.

data.name: uForceNUpdate
description: A control to force an N and CTS value update to the audio DPLL. The audio DPLL regenerates the audio clock.

values.description: No effect
Forces an update on the N and CTS values for audio clock regeneration

data.name: uHpaDelaySel
description: Sets a delay between +5 V detection and hot plug assertion on the HPA output pins, in increments of 100ms
per bit.

values.description: No Delay
100 ms Delay
200 ms Delay
1 s Delay
1.5 s Delay

data.name: uHpaOvrTerm
description: A control to set termination control to be overridden by the HPA setting. When this bit is set,
termination on a specific port will be set according to the HPA status of that port.

values.description: Automatic or manual I2C control of port termination.
Termination controls disabled and overridden by HPA controls.

data.name: uHpaAutoIntEdid
description: Selects the type of automatic control on the HPA output pins. This bit has no effect when HPA_MANUAL is
set to 1
that port. The HPA of a specific HDMI port is de-asserted low immediately after the internal E-EDID is
de-activated for that port.
cable plug on that port. The HPA of an HDMI port is immediately de-asserted after the part detects a cable
disconnect on that HDMI port.
detailed as follows. 1. The internal EDID is active for that port. 2. The delayed version of the cable
detect signal CABLE_DET_X_RAW for that port is high. The HPA of an HDMI port is immediately de-asserted
after any of the following two conditions have been met 1. The internal EDID is de-activated for that port
detailed as follows. 1. The internal EDID is active for that port. 2. The delayed version of the cable
detect signal CABLE_DET_X_RAW for that port is high. 3. The user has set the manual HPA control for that
port to 1 via the HPA_MAN_VALUE_X controls. The HPA of an HDMI port is immediately de-asserted after any
of the following three conditions have been met 1.The internal EDID is de-activated for that port 2.The
cable detect signal CABLE_DET_X_RAW for that port, is low. 3.The user sets the manual HPD control for that
port to 0 via the HPA_MAN_VALUE_X controls

values.description: The HPA of an HDMI port is asserted high immediately after the internal EDID has been activated for
The HPA of an HDMI port is asserted high following a programmable delay after the part detects an HDMI
The HPA of an HDMI port is asserted high after two conditions have been met. The conditions are

values.value: 2. The cable detect signal CABLE_DET_X_RAW for that port is low.
values.description: undefined
The HPA of an HDMI port is asserted high after three conditions have been met. The conditions are

data.name: uHpaManual
description: Manual control enable for the Hot Plug Assert output pins. By setting this bit any automatic control of
these pins is disabled. Manual control is determined by the HPA_MAN_VALUE_X (where X = A, B, C, D & E)

values.description: HPA takes its value based on HPA_AUTO_INT_EDID
HPA takes its value from HPA_MAN_VALUE_X

data.name: uI2sTdmModeEnable
description: Enables I2S TDM output mode, where all 4 stereo pairs come out through I2S[0] pin. This mode can only be
used in multi channel modes. Only the following fs ratios for MCLKOUT are valid: 1, 2 or 4.

values.description: Disable TDM mode, each stereo pair will come out in  an APx pin.
Enable TDM mode, all 4 stereo pairs will be time multiplexed into AP1/I2S_TDM pin

data.name: uI2sSpdifMapInv
description: A control to invert the arrangement of the I2S/SPDIF interface on the audio output port pins. Note the
arrangement of the I2S/SPDIF interface on the audio output port pins is determined by I2S_SPDIF_MAP_ROT.

values.description: Do not invert arrangement of I2S/SPDIF channels in audio output port pins
Invert arrangement of I2S/SPDIF channels in audio output port pins

data.name: uI2sSpdifMapRot
description: A control to select the arrangement of the I2S/SPDIF interface on the audio output port pins.

values.description: [I2S0/SPDIF0 on AP1] [I2S1/SPDIF1 on AP2] [I2S2/SPDIF2 on AP3] [I2S3/SPDIF3 on AP4]
[I2S3/SPDIF3 on AP1] [I2S0/SPDIF0 on AP2] [I2S1/SPDIF1 on AP3] [I2S2/SPDIF2 on AP4]
[I2S2/SPDIF2 on AP1] [I2S3/SPDIF3 on AP2] [I2S0/SPDIF0 on AP3] [I2S1/SPDIF1 on AP4]
[I2S1/SPDIF1 on AP1] [I2S2/SPDIF2 on AP2] [I2S3/SPDIF3 on AP3] [I2S0/SPDIF0 on AP4]

data.name: uDsdMapInv

arrangement of the DSD interface on the audio output port pins is determined by DSD_MAP_ROT.

values.description: Do not invert arrangement of the DSD channels on the audio output port pins
Invert arrangement of the DSD channels on the audio output port pins

data.name: uDsdMapRot

values.description: [DSD0A on AP0] [DSD0B on AP1] [DSD1A on AP2] [DSD1B on AP3] [DSD2A on AP4] [DSD2B on AP5]
[DSD2B on AP0] [DSD0A on AP1] [DSD0B on AP2] [DSD1A on AP3] [DSD1B on AP4] [DSD2A on AP5]

[DSD1A on AP0] [DSD1B on AP1] [DSD2A on AP2] [DSD2B on AP3] [DSD0A on AP4] [DSD0B on AP5]
[DSD0B on AP0] [DSD1A on AP1] [DSD1B on AP2] [DSD2A on AP3] [DSD2B on AP4] [DSD0A on AP5]

data.name: uClockTermbDisable
description: Disable clock termination on port B. Can be used when TERM_AUTO set to 0

values.description: Enable Termination port B
Disable Termination port B

data.name: uClockTermaDisable
description: Disable clock termination on port A. Can be used when TERM_AUTO set to 0

values.description: Enable Termination port A
Disable Termination port A

data.name: uBgTmdsfreq
description: This register provides a precision integer TMDS frequency measurement on the background port selected by
BG_MEAS_PORT_SEL. The value provided is the result of a single measurement of the TMDS PLL frequency in
MHz. This value is updated when an update request is made via the BG_MEAS_REQ control bit. This
measurement is only valid when BG_PARAM_LOCK is set to 1.
xxxxxxxxx - Outputs 9-bit TMDS frequency measurement in MHz

values.description: Outputs 9-bit TMDS frequency measurement in MHz

data.name: uBgTmdsfreq
description: This register provides a precision integer TMDS frequency measurement on the background port selected by
BG_MEAS_PORT_SEL. The value provided is the result of a single measurement of the TMDS PLL frequency in
MHz. This value is updated when an update request is made via the BG_MEAS_REQ control bit. This
measurement is only valid when BG_PARAM_LOCK is set to 1.
xxxxxxxxx - Outputs 9-bit TMDS frequency measurement in MHz

values.description: Outputs 9-bit TMDS frequency measurement in MHz

data.name: uBgTmdsfreqFrac
description: This register provides a precision fractional measurement of the TMDS frequency on the background port
selected by BG_MEAS_PORT_SEL. The unit is 1/128 MHz and the value is updated when a update request is made
via the BG_MEAS_REQ control bit.  This measurement is only valid when BG_PARAM_LOCK is set to 1.
xxxxxxx - Outputs 7-bit TMDS fractional frequency measurement in 1/128MHz

values.description: Outputs 7-bit TMDS fractional frequency measurement in 1/128MHz

data.name: uReserved7_5
description: No description.

data.name: uBgLineWidth
description: Background port line width, a horizontal synchronization measurement for the background HDMI Port
determined by BG_MEAS_PORT_SEL[1:0]. The value represents the number of active pixels in a line and is
updated when a update request is made via the BG_MEAS_REQ control bit.
xxxxxxxxxxxxx - The number of active pixels per line on the background measurement port.

values.description: The number of active pixels per line on the background measurement port.

data.name: uBgLineWidth
description: Background port line width, a horizontal synchronization measurement for the background HDMI Port
determined by BG_MEAS_PORT_SEL[1:0]. The value represents the number of active pixels in a line and is
updated when a update request is made via the BG_MEAS_REQ control bit.

values.description: The number of active pixels per line on the background measurement port.

description: No description.

when BG_PARAM_LOCK is set to 1.
xxxxxxxxxxxxxx - The total number of pixels per line on the background measurement port

data.name: uBgTotalLineWidth

updated when a update request is made via the BG_MEAS_REQ control bit.  This measurement is only valid
when BG_PARAM_LOCK is set to 1.
xxxxxxxxxxxxxx - The total number of pixels per line on the background measurement port

data.name: uReserved7_5
description: No description.

data.name: uBgFieldHeight

determined by BG_MEAS_PORT_SEL[1:0]. The value represents the number of  active lines in a field and is
updated when a update request is made via the BG_MEAS_REQ control bit.
xxxxxxxxxxxxx - The number of active lines in a Field on the background measurement port

values.description: The number of active lines in a Field on the background measurement port

data.name: uBgFieldHeight
description: Background port field height is a vertical synchronization measurement for a background HDMI Port
determined by BG_MEAS_PORT_SEL[1:0]. The value represents the number of  active lines in a field and is
updated when a update request is made via the BG_MEAS_REQ control bit.
xxxxxxxxxxxxx - The number of active lines in a Field on the background measurement port

values.description: The number of active lines in a Field on the background measurement port

data.name: uReserved7_5
description: No description.

data.name: uBgTotalFieldHeight
description: Background port total field height is a vertical synchronization measurement for the background HDMI Port
determined by BG_MEAS_PORT_SEL[1:0]. The value represents the total number of lines in a field and is
updated when an update request is made via the BG_MEAS_REQ control bit.
xxxxxxxxxxxxx - The total number of lines in a Field on the background measurement port

values.description: The total number of lines in a Field on the background measurement port

data.name: uBgTotalFieldHeight
description: Background port total field height is a vertical synchronization measurement for the background HDMI Port
determined by BG_MEAS_PORT_SEL[1:0]. The value represents the total number of lines in a field and is
updated when an update request is made via the BG_MEAS_REQ control bit.
xxxxxxxxxxxxx - The total number of lines in a Field on the background measurement port

values.description: The total number of lines in a Field on the background measurement port

data.name: uBgPixRep
description: Background port pixel repetition status for the background HDMI port determined by BG_MEAS_PORT_SEL[1:0].
The readback provides the pixel repetition value in AVI Infoframe and is updated when an update request is
made via the BG_MEAS_REQ control bit. This measurement is only valid when BG_PARAM_LOCK is set to 1.

values.description: 1x
2x
3x
4x
5x
6x
7x
8x
9x

data.name: uBgDeepColorMode
description: This readback provides the deep-color status for the background HDMI port determined by
BG_MEAS_PORT_SEL[1:0]. The readback provides the HDMI color depth and is updated when an update request is
made via the BG_MEAS_REQ control bit. This measurement is only valid when BG_PARAM_LOCK is set to 1.

values.description: 8-bit color per channel
10-bit color per channel
12-bit color per channel
16-bit color per channel

data.name: uBgParamLock
description: A flag to indicate that vertical and horizontal parameters have been locked during a background
measurement.

values.description: Horizontal and Vertical were not locked when measurement for select background HDMI port were taken.
Horizontal and Vertical were locked when measurement for select background HDMI port were taken.

data.name: uBgHdmiInterlaced
description: Background port HDMI input interlace status is a vertical filter measurement for a background HDMI Port
determined by BG_MEAS_PORT_SEL[1:0]. The status readback is updated when a update request is made via the
BG_MEAS_REQ control bit. This measurement is only valid when BG_PARAM_LOCK is set to 1.

values.description: Progressive Input
Interlaced Input

data.name: uReserved7_1
description: No description.

data.name: uBgHdmiMode
description: This readback provides the HDMI/DVI mode status of the background port determined by BG_MEAS_PORT_SEL[1:0]
and is updated continuously.

values.description: DVI Mode Detected
HDMI Mode Detected

data.name: uReserved7_6
description: No description.

data.name: uBgAudioLayout
description: Flags layout of audio channels in background port selected with BG_MEAS_PORT_SEL. Only valid when
AUDIO_DETECTED_BG flags audio sample packets or DSD audio packets have been detected

data.name: uBgDstDouble
description: Flags whether DST audio is sampled at single or double transfer rate in the background port with
BG_MEAS_PORT_SEL. Only valid when AUDIO_DETECTED_BG flags DST packets have been received

values.description: DST sample rate equals transfer rate
DST sample rate doubles transfer rate

data.name: uBgAudioDetected
description: Flags which kind of audio samples were last received

values.description: No audio samples detected
Audio sample detected
DSD audio detected
DST audio detected
HBR audio detected

data.name: uBgHeaderRequested
description: Byte 0 of header for the infoframe selected to be read in background port.

data.name: uBgHeaderByte1
description: Byte 1 of header for the infoframe selected to be read in background port.

data.name: uBgPacketByte1
description: Byte 1 of packet for the infoframe selected to be read in background port.

data.name: uBgPacketByte2
description: Byte 2 of packet for the infoframe selected to be read in background port.

data.name: uBgPacketByte3
description: Byte 3 of packet for the infoframe selected to be read in background port.

data.name: uBgPacketByte4
description: Byte 4 of packet for the infoframe selected to be read in background port.

data.name: uBgPacketByte5
description: Byte5 of packet for the infoframe selected to be read in background port.

data.name: uReserved7_1
description: No description.

data.name: uBgValidPacket
description: Readbacks of packet in bg port are only valid if this signal is high
